description:
Do your children enjoy making a scene?

Then give them 'Make a Scene', and give yourself some precious peace and quiet.

Make a Scene Easter is a fun interactive game that engages children’s natural sense of creativity. It is aimed primarily at pre-school age children, but will provide hours of entertainment for children (and adults!) of all ages. Helping to develop vocabulary, fine motor skills, co-ordination and creative thinking, Make a Scene offers a great way for your child to play and learn at the same time.

This seasonal edition is a great way for children to learn and have some fun this Easter holiday. Children will have endless fun using their imagination to create their very own Easter and Spring time scenes. Make a virtual Easter egg hunt, see the woodland creatures playing in a bluebell wood, see the new spring lambs playing in the fields or take the family and their dog on a picnic!

Stickers include Easter eggs, chicks, lambs, rabbits, a family, picnic items, flowers and much more. By dragging and dropping these digital, animated ‘stickers’ onto the different backgrounds available, your child can create a large number of unique scenes. A clear voice-over reads the name of each item aloud, and is accompanied by fun animations and sound effects where possible. Make a Scene recreates the popular ‘fuzzy felts’ and sticker books in an interactive digital product.

Key features:

Over 60 ‘stickers’ to use across 7 different backgrounds and 6 different foregrounds allowing endless scene possibilities
Multi touch enabled
Automatic direction based flip
Save scene as an image to your device
Automatic directional based flip
Automatic depth of field
Easy-to-use toolbar and menus
Descriptive audio
Engaging animations
Sound effects 
Background sounds to bring the experience to life
Ability to move and re-arrange ‘stickers’
Ability to remove individual ‘stickers’ or reset all ‘stickers’ and position them once again
